title: Rust
description: Survival game in a harsh open-world environment where players must gather resources, craft items, and build shelters to survive.

title: Path of Exile
description: A dark fantasy action RPG with deep customization, challenging gameplay, and a vast world to explore.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Epic tale of life in America at the dawn of the modern age. A story-driven open-world game from Rockstar.
